main event: A blue-green football-shaped UFO was observed over Richmond, Virginia on September 1, 1952.
interesting points: The object appeared intermittently for about half an hour,It was described as being about three times larger than a full moon,The object was self-luminous and resembled a sparkler,There were poor visibility conditions due to an electrical storm at the time of observation,No physical evidence was obtained and the observation was reported to the authorities after a delay of approximately two to four hours.
